author: Staff Reporter
text:
RI for rape

Thoothukudi Fast Track Mahila Court Judge J. Flora on Monday sentenced a man, accused of sexually assaulting a minor girl, to undergo seven years of rigorous imprisonment.

According to the prosecution, K. Senthil Kumar (28) of Ayan Vadamalapuram, a casual labourer, was found guilty of sexually assaulting a 17-year-old girl from the same locality, on May 31 in 2014. The accused was punished under Section 4 of The Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012, for which a seven-year RI with fine of Rs.3,000 and Section – 506 (i) of IPC (criminal intimidation), for which 1-year RI with fine of Rs.1,000, were awarded. He will undergo the sentences concurrently.
title: Seven-year RI for man
